editor.label: Application Server - IIS PauseWebSite
editor.description: This procedure pauses a web site. This is similar to stopping, except pausing allows existing processes to continue to their conclusion.

formElement.label: Host name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS server. If the procedure is run on the host itself use 'localhost', the default value. (Required)

formElement.label: Web side id:
formElement.documentation: Provide the site identification number to attach to the site that you want to pause. (Required)
